overview: Vidas Entregues is a documentary about food-delivery app workers that work using bicycles. The objective of the movie is to bring a debate about the precarization of work conditions, low payments, and also lack of work and social rights. Besides fighting the romanticization of unemployment and absolute needing, the true responsibles for pushing millions of people towards working to this apps under the guise of entrepreneurship.
title: Vidas Entregues
